mapper.insert: insert into article(articleId, articleTitle, outline, articleContent, publishTime, status) VALUES (#{articleId},#{articleTitle},#{outline},#{articleContent},#{createTime},#{status})
mapper.update: update article set status = 0 where articleId=#{value}
update article set status = 1 where articleId=#{value}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,c.cName from article as a, category as c, categoryOfArticle as ca WHERE a.articleId = ca.articleId and c.cid = ca.cid order by a.id desc
select * from article where articleTile like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{value}), '%')
select articleId from tagsOfArticle where tagId = #{value}
SELECT a.*,c.cName from article as a, category as c, categoryOfArticle as ca WHERE a.articleId = ca.articleId and c.cid = ca.cid and a.articleId=#{value}
select * from article where articleId = ( select articleId from article where status = 1 and articleId < #{value} order by id desc limit 1)
select * from article where articleId = (select articleId from article where status = 1 and articleId > #{value} order by id asc limit 1)
select * from article where articleId in (select articleId from categoryOfArticle where cid = (select cid from category where cName=#{value})) order by id desc
select * from article where status = 1 AND articleId in (select articleId from tagsOfArticle where tagId = (select tagId from tag where tagName =#{value})) order by id desc
